body:
Signature should be:
```uint64_t writeData(char* data, size_t size_in_bytes)```

This should not have to know what a tensor is. We will use it to store non-tensor data.
body_html:
Signature should be:
uint64_t writeData(char* data, size_t size_in_bytes)

This should not have to know what a tensor is. We will use it to store non-tensor data.
